upload.name: Upload file
upload.description: Upload file to Google Drive service

parent_id.name: Parent ID
parent_id.description: The Google Drive ID of the parent folder where the upload will be made.

target_dir_name.name: Target directory name
target_dir_name.description: The name of the directory where the new file will be uploaded.

upload_file_path.name: File path
upload_file_path.description: The path to retrieve the file to be uploaded.

delete.name: Delete directory or file
delete.description: Delete directory or file from Google Drive

parent_id.name: Parent ID
parent_id.description: The Google Drive ID of the parent folder that contains the resource to remove

dir_name.name: Directory name (or filename)
dir_name.description: The name of the resource to delete
